content.html: as usual I'm not doing a Black Friday sale, but here's your periodic reminder that if you're in a country with a weaker currency than the US (India, Russia, Brazil, etc), there's a discount to make the zines more affordable. You can see it in action here: wizardzines.com/zines/all-the-‚Ä¶
